channel.title: Homes on Billy Fang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Billy Fang

item.title: Publications
item.description: Multivariate extensions of isotonic regression and total variation denoising via entire monotonicity and Hardy-Krause variation Billy Fang, Adityanand Guntuboyina, Bodhisattva Sen Annals of Statistics. 2021. item.title: Teaching
item.description: Graduate student instructor, UC Berkeley STAT 154 (Modern Statistical Prediction and Machine Learning). Spring 2020. STAT 151A (Linear Modeling). Fall 2019. STAT 134 (Concepts of Probability). Summer 2018. STAT 151A (Linear Modeling). Fall 2017. STAT 134 (Concepts of Probability). Summer 2016.

item.title: Notes
item.description: The following are personal notes and expository material for various courses and topics. Course notes Information theory. 2016. Analysis of big data. 2015. Probability theory (measure theoretic). 2014. Artificial intelligence. 2013. Probability theory (undergraduate). 2012. Expository material Introduction to the Dirichlet Process. 2016.
